Text QR Code.description: This API function empowers users to create personalized QR Codes with text, like URLs, that guide individuals to designated websites upon scanning. Users can extensively customize the style, size, and output format of the QR Code, including color, shape, eye designs, and background, to craft unique codes tailored to their preferences.

example.User Query: Produce a QR code with a combination of black and red colors, a circular shape for the modules, and a custom background design that leads individuals to a designated webpage when scanned

Parameters.image: Binary data of the QR code

Upload image.name: Upload image
Upload image.description: This API endpoint facilitates image uploads to LinQR storage, providing metadata for the uploaded image, including an identifier for image identification. The maximum file size for upload is 1MiB.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: Binary file to be uploaded into LinQR storage. Maximum single file size is 1MiB (1,048,576 bytes).

example.User Query: Could you assist me in uploading a photo of a mountain peak covered in snow for safekeeping?

Parameters.image: Binary file of the snow-covered mountain peak photo

Contact QR Code.name: Contact QR Code
Contact QR Code.description: This API endpoint generates a QR Code containing contact information for easy addition to a phone book. The encoded electronic business card includes details such as name, organization, email, phone number, city, and country. Users are prompted to save the contact upon scanning.

example.User Query: Create a QR Code for a business contact with the following details: first name - Alex, last name - Brown, organization - XYZ Corp, email - alex.brown@example.com, phone - +1-555-7777-888, city - Chicago, country - Canada with a custom module color and shape for the QR Code

Geolocation QR Code.name: Geolocation QR Code
Geolocation QR Code.description: This tool allows users to generate a customized QR Code representing specific geographic coordinates with personalized styling for pinpointing locations on map applications. Users can customize module color, shape, and output format. Precise parameter input is crucial for successful execution, and users should be aware of potential import errors.

example.User Query: Create a QR Code that represents a location with latitude 35.6895 and longitude 139.6917, with a red module color and circular shape, and save it in JPEG format

Telephone QR Code.name: Telephone QR Code
Telephone QR Code.description: This API endpoint generates a QR Code with a phone number for quick calling. Scanning the code prompts the device's dialer with the prefilled number for easy calling by the user. Customization options include specifying the phone number, module shape, color, and width of the QR Code.

example.User Query: Generate a QR Code for a personal mobile number with a custom module shape and a specific width.

Cryptocurrency payment QR Code.name: Cryptocurrency payment QR Code
Cryptocurrency payment QR Code.description: This API endpoint generates a QR Code for cryptocurrency payments, streamlining the payment process by encoding payment details for easy scanning by cryptocurrency wallet applications.

example.User Query: Generate a QR Code for a cryptocurrency payment using Ripple for 'Emily White' with an amount of 50 XRP.

SMS QR Code.name: SMS QR Code
SMS QR Code.description: This tool efficiently generates a QR Code for sending SMS messages. It simplifies the process by pre-filling the recipient's phone number and message. Scanning the code launches the device's messaging app for quick sending. The tool also provides error handling functionalities.

example.User Query: Generate a QR Code for sending an SMS to +1-123-456-7890 with a personalized invitation message for a special event happening next week.

WiFi QR Code.name: WiFi QR Code
WiFi QR Code.description: This API endpoint generates a QR Code containing network credentials for quick WiFi network connection. Users can scan the code to automatically connect to the specified network without manual password entry. It supports various security protocols such as WPA, WEP, etc.

example.User Query: Generate a QR Code for connecting to a WiFi network named 'Vacation Villa WiFi' with the password 'Beach123!' using the WPA security protocol and a circular QR Code shape.

Arbitrary data type QR Code.name: Arbitrary data type QR Code
Arbitrary data type QR Code.description: This API endpoint enables users to create personalized QR codes with tailored data, image settings, and output formats. Users can customize design elements like the inner eye shape and background pattern to suit their preferences, supporting modern designs, unique background patterns, and larger sizes for distinctive codes.

example.User Query: Generate a QR code with a modern design, featuring a unique background pattern and a larger size with a width of 250 and a quiet zone of 5.

Email QR Code.name: Email QR Code
Email QR Code.description: This API function allows users to generate a QR code tailored for sending emails with predefined recipient details, subject, and message body. The QR code streamlines email creation by pre-filling fields upon scanning, offering customization options for design elements like the outer eye shape and size.

data.subject: Example subject
data.body:
Example message body for Email QRCode.

Regards,
LinQR

example.User Query: Create a QR code for sending an email with a special design for the outer eye shape and a larger size, while including recipient details, subject, and message body

data.subject: Special Offer Inside!
data.body:
Hi there,

Check out our latest special offer by scanning this QR code.

Best regards,
Your Company

QR Code Batch.name: QR Code Batch
QR Code Batch.description: This tool allows you to generate an archive containing multiple QR Codes with a single request. The response includes the archive with image files and an `items.json` file detailing the specifications of each QR code. Batch generation functionality is temporarily disabled due to an error.

example.User Query: I'm looking to create a set of QR codes for a scavenger hunt activity in a city-wide event. Can you help me generate a batch of unique QR codes for different locations across the city?

244.tool_description: Discord Lookup is a tool that can lookup Discord users by ID, invite data & joins by invite code, and hidden vanity data. This tool has 2 multiple built-in functions: 1. Get Invite Data is to fetch detailed data for invites or vanities. 2. Get User Data is to fetch user data by their ID.

Get Invite Data.name: Get Invite Data
Get Invite Data.description: Fetches detailed data for invites or vanities. Note: Errors may occur for expired or invalid invite codes.

example.User Query: I need insights on how the API handles expired invite codes. Can you fetch detailed data for an expired invite code 'expired789'?

Get User Data.name: Get User Data
Get User Data.description: Fetches user data by their ID. Handles rate limits and provides user information based on the ID provided.

example.User Query: Retrieve user data for ID 31415926535

245.tool_description: AresPass is a tool that can analyze the strength of passwords by calculating their entropy and providing a detailed report on password fragments with low randomness. This tool has two built-in functions: 1. /about is to retrieve metadata about the tool. 2. /ec is to analyze the strength of a password with optional parameters for penalty and output format.

/about.name: /about
/about.description: This API allows users to retrieve metadata about a specific tool. It supports the 'outputFormat' parameter for specifying the format of the returned metadata, with allowed values of 'json', 'xml', and 'yaml'. The default value for 'outputFormat' is 'xml'.

optional_parameters.name: outputFormat
optional_parameters.description:
**The format of the returned metadata.**

Allowed values are *json*, *xml* and *yaml*.

The default value is *xml*.

example.User Query: I need details about a tool in XML format.

/ec.name: /ec
/ec.description: Analyze the strength of a password with an optional penalty parameter. The default output format is JSON.

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description:
**The password to be analyzed.**

Minimum length is 4 characters; maximum length is 128 characters.

Beware that certain characters like '#', '=' or '?' must be properly encoded.

For more information about this issue, please refer to RFC 3986 ("*Uniform Resource Identifier (URI): Generic Syntax*"), sections 2.1, 2.2 and 2.4.

optional_parameters.name: penalty
optional_parameters.description:
**The penalty applied to each character that is part of a word, number sequence, alphabet sequence, etc.**

The penalty is a float number in the range [0, 1]. Full penalty, 0; no penalty, 1.

The character used as decimal separator is always '.'. Hence, a parameter value like *0,33* would be illegal.

The default value is *0.25*.

optional_parameters.name: outputFormat
optional_parameters.description:
**The format of the returned analysis.**

Allowed values are *json*, *xml* and *yaml*.

The default value is *xml*.

optional_parameters.name: reqId
optional_parameters.description:
**An identifier for this request.**

The request identifier is a string that must match the regular expression */(?i)^[a-z0-9]{8,16}$/*.

This identifier is echoed in the returned response. Its value has no effect on the password analysis.

If this parameter is unset, a randomly generated identifier will be automatically assigned to this request.

example.User Query: Please assess the strength of my password 'Secure123!' with a penalty factor of 0.5.

246.tool_description: Alt Bichinhos is a tool that can provide pet images with alt text in multiple languages. This tool has 5 multiple built-in functions: 1. Get All Languages is to retrieve a structured list of languages supported for a specified image. 2. Get German Alt Text is to provide German alt text for pet images. 3. Get Spanish Alt Text is to deliver a pet image along with its corresponding alt text in Spanish. 4. Get Portuguese Alt Text is to retrieve pet images along with their corresponding Brazilian Portuguese alternative text. 5. Get English Alt Text is to provide users with a pet image accompanied by alt text in English.

Get All Languages.name: Get All Languages
Get All Languages.description: This API function retrieves a structured list of languages supported for a specified image, with the option to display error messages in case of issues.

example.User Query: What are the language options available for a nature-themed image?

Get German Alt Text..name: Get German Alt Text.
Get German Alt Text..description: This endpoint is designed to provide German alt text for pet images. However, due to ongoing technical issues, the API may not return accurate results consistently. It is advised to verify the functionality before relying on the output. Additionally, the tool may currently experience intermittent errors that could impact its reliability.

example.User Query: I'm interested in understanding the potential impact of using German alt text for pet images on user engagement. Can you provide insights into any studies or data that showcase the effectiveness of localized descriptions?

Get Spanish Alt Text.name: Get Spanish Alt Text
Get Spanish Alt Text.description: This API endpoint is designed to deliver a pet image along with its corresponding alt text in Spanish. Presently, the API is not operational and needs maintenance to restore functionality.

example.User Query: I'm looking for an image of a majestic lion with Spanish descriptive text.

Get Portuguese Alt Text..name: Get Portuguese Alt Text.
Get Portuguese Alt Text..description: This API function is intended to retrieve pet images along with their corresponding Brazilian Portuguese alternative text. However, due to technical issues, the API is currently not operational. Users may experience errors when attempting to use this service.

example.User Query: I'm curious about the current status of the technical issues affecting the retrieval of pet images with Brazilian Portuguese alternative text. Can you provide any insights into the root cause or potential solutions for this problem?

Get English Alt Text..name: Get English Alt Text.
Get English Alt Text..description: This tool aims to provide users with a pet image accompanied by alt text in English. Currently, the API is encountering technical difficulties and is displaying an error message. Efforts are underway to rectify the issue, with an estimated resolution time pending. Users are recommended to seek alternative solutions or workarounds in the meantime.

example.User Query: Could you provide me with a visual of a majestic lion along with its English alternative text description?

247.tool_description: Haskell Code Compiler is a tool that can compile Haskell programs and query specific versions of the Glasgow Haskell Compiler (GHC). This tool has two built-in functions: 1. Haskell Versions is to retrieve a list of GHC versions with their corresponding names. 2. Haskell Code Compiler is to compile Haskell programs, with limitations in handling multiple custom functions, external module imports, and complex recursive data structures.

Haskell Versions.name: Haskell Versions
Haskell Versions.description: This tool allows users to query and retrieve specific versions of the Glasgow Haskell Compiler (GHC), providing a list of GHC versions with their corresponding names in the response. It does not offer release dates for specific Haskell versions.

example.User Query: What are the different versions of the Glasgow Haskell Compiler (GHC) and their corresponding names?

Haskell Code Compiler.name: Haskell Code Compiler
Haskell Code Compiler.description: Haskell Code Compiler: This tool is designed to compile Haskell programs. Users should be aware of potential import errors and may need to troubleshoot them. The tool has limitations in handling programs with multiple custom functions, external module imports, and complex recursive data structures. Users should be prepared to address import issues and consider simplifying their code to avoid potential errors.

example.User Query: Compile a Haskell program that implements a complex recursive data structure

248.tool_description: mmm is a tool that can retrieve information about specific devices. This tool has one built-in function: 1. 22 is to retrieve devices that are water-resistant, have a size of 22mm, and potentially include additional features like heart rate monitoring.

22.description: API for retrieving devices that are water-resistant, have a size of 22mm, and potentially include additional features like heart rate monitoring.

example.User Query: I'm looking for devices that are water-resistant, have a size of 22mm, and come with a heart rate monitor feature.

249.tool_description: suivi-colis is a tool that can track and monitor the status of packages in New Caledonia. This tool has four multiple built-in functions: 1. Health is to check the status of the API's health, including the overall status and any specific health checks performed. 2. Latest is to retrieve the latest status of a package based on the provided package tracking ID. 3. Count is to count the number of events in the logistics tracking process based on the provided tracking number. 4. All is to track the complete history of a package from its shipment to the latest status update.

Health.name: Health
Health.description: Check the status of the API's health, including the overall status (UP/DOWN) and any specific health checks performed. It also provides historical data on the API's health status checks over a specified period.

example.User Query: Retrieve the historical data of the API's health status checks over the past month.

Latest.name: Latest
Latest.description: Retrieves the latest status of a package based on the provided package tracking ID. Returns an error message if the 'colisId' parameter is missing or invalid. Note that the 'colisId' parameter is case-sensitive.

example.User Query: What additional details can be obtained about the latest status of package CA107308006SI?

Count.name: Count
Count.description: Counts the number of events in the logistics tracking process based on the provided tracking number. Useful for tracking the progress of a parcel or shipment.

example.User Query: I need to know the total number of status updates for the parcel with tracking ID CA107308006SI.

All.name: All
All.description: Track the complete history of a package from its shipment to the latest status update, displaying details such as country, date, location, status, and event type for each tracking event.

example.User Query: I'm interested in knowing if there have been any delivery exceptions for package CA107308006SI and where the latest exception occurred.

250.tool_description: Qr Code Generator_v5 is a tool that can convert strings to QR codes. This tool has 1 built-in function: 1. qr code is to generate QR codes from a given URL.

qr code.name: qr code
qr code.description: QR Code Generator tool that may experience intermittent unavailability issues. Users may encounter errors such as 'API not working error...' when generating QR codes. Contact the API provider for assistance.

example.User Query: Check the status of the QR code generation tool and provide details on the frequency and duration of the reported unavailability issues

251.tool_description: OTT details is a tool that can get streaming details of movies and TV shows. This tool has 8 multiple built-in functions: 1. Advanced Search is to search for movies or TV shows based on specified parameters such as release year, IMDb rating, genre, and language. 2. Basic Info is to retrieve detailed information about a specific actor based on their unique identifier. 3. Params is to retrieve array values for genres or languages to be used as filters in Advanced Search. 4. Search is to search for movies and TV shows based on the provided title. 5. Title Details is to retrieve basic information about a movie or TV show using the IMDb ID. 6. Additional Title Details is to retrieve additional details for a movie or TV show, such as reviews, quotes, plot summary, number of votes, trailer URL, and cast details. 7. OTT Providers is to retrieve information on OTT platforms available in specific regions. 8. New Arrivals is to retrieve the latest movie arrivals for US and Indian regions.

Advanced Search.name: Advanced Search
Advanced Search.description: This endpoint allows you to search for movies or TV shows based on specified parameters such as release year, IMDb rating, genre, and language. Results are paginated, and the API may return an empty set if no matches are found. It supports filtering by start year, end year, IMDb rating range, type (movie or show), sorting options, genre, and language. The response includes IMDb ID, title, IMDb rating, release year, and type.

optional_parameters.name: start_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year between 1970 to 2020 to get results.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Enter type 'movie' or 'show'

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Enter values highestrated , lowestrated , latest , oldest to  sort results accodingly .

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple genre eg : action,horror

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple values , eg : english,german

optional_parameters.name: end_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year from 1970 to 2020 to  get results.

example.User Query: I'm looking for movies released between 1980 and 1990 with IMDb ratings ranging from 7 to 9, in the genres of sci-fi and fantasy, and in German language.

Basic Info.name: Basic Info
Basic Info.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific actor based on their unique identifier, including their profession, birth year, biography, poster, and notable titles they have appeared in.

example.User Query: Who is the actor known for his roles in action movies? I want to know his profession, birth year, and notable titles.

Params.name: Params
Params.description: Retrieve array values for genres or languages to be used as filters in Advanced Search. The tool provides information on available genres or languages for filtering purposes.

required_parameters.name: param
required_parameters.description: input 'genre' or 'language' to get array of genre or languages that can be used as filter in advanced search .

example.User Query: I want to know if there are any additional filters available for advanced search.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: This endpoint allows you to search for movies and TV shows based on the provided title. The search is title-based only, and authorization is required for access. Potential errors may include unauthorized access.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: *Maximum number of pages returned is 10

example.User Query: Show me movies with the title 'Action' released in 2020 on page 2

Title Details.name: Title Details
Title Details.description: Retrieve basic information about a movie or TV show using the IMDb ID, including details like title, genre, runtime, IMDb rating, language, synopsis, type, image URL, and potentially streaming platform information. The response will contain key-value pairs for each detail retrieved, such as release year, cast, director, and production studio.

example.User Query: What are the basic details of the film identified by the IMDb ID tt1122334?

Additional Title Details.name: Additional Title Details
Additional Title Details.description: Retrieve additional details for a movie or TV show, such as reviews, quotes, plot summary, number of votes, trailer URL, and cast details. The response format is JSON. Note: The API response may not include an error message even if the response is empty, and availability of details like quotes can vary.

example.User Query: I'd like to learn about the plot summary and reviews for the movie with the IMDb ID tt0111161.

OTT Providers.name: OTT Providers
OTT Providers.description: Retrieve information on OTT platforms available in specific regions. Supported regions include the USA and India.

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: currently only USA and India region is supported enter param 'US' for USA and 'IN' for India.

example.User Query: Can you provide a comparison of the movie libraries between OTT platforms in India?

New Arrivals.name: New Arrivals
New Arrivals.description: Retrieve the latest movie arrivals for US and Indian regions. Specify the region using 'IN' for India and 'US' for the USA. Use the optional parameter 'page' for pagination, with the possibility of empty results.

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: Use 'IN' for India and 'US' for USA , * currently we support only US and Indian region.

example.User Query: What are the most recent movie arrivals in the USA on page 7?

252.tool_description: 👋 Demo Project_v13 is a tool that can retrieve and manage product and order information. This tool has 7 multiple built-in functions: 1. Get Products in Category is to retrieve products in a specified category with options to filter by price range, RAM size, and other attributes. 2. Me is to retrieve information based on specific parameters. 3. Get Product is to retrieve product details by providing the product ID. 4. Get Categories is to retrieve available categories based on the API response. 5. Get User Orders is to securely retrieve recent user orders by authenticating access. 6. Get Products is to retrieve a specified number of products with the option to skip a certain number of products. 7. Get Order is to retrieve order details based on the provided order ID.

Get Products in Category.name: Get Products in Category
Get Products in Category.description: Retrieve products in a specified category with options to filter by price range, RAM size, and other attributes. Returns a list of products with IDs, names, and categories, along with a summary count.

example.User Query: Show me laptops with at least 16GB RAM and a price range of $1000-$1500 in the electronics category

Me.name: Me
Me.description: This tool provides functionality to retrieve information based on specific parameters. The correct usage of parameters is essential to avoid errors, including 'Unauthorized error'. Proper authentication is necessary to prevent such issues.

example.User Query: Could you provide me with information about the tallest mountains in the world?

Get Product.name: Get Product
Get Product.description: Retrieve product details by providing the product ID as a parameter. Call the function without any unexpected keyword arguments to avoid errors.

example.User Query: Please fetch the product information for the item with ID 24680.

Get Categories.name: Get Categories
Get Categories.description: This tool retrieves available categories based on the API response, which may include unexpected or irrelevant results.

Get User Orders.name: Get User Orders
Get User Orders.description: This tool allows users to securely retrieve their recent orders by authenticating their access. Proper authorization is required for accessing order history. Unauthorized requests result in a 401 Unauthorized error with a clear message indicating 'Unauthorized'.

example.User Query: How can I authenticate to access my order history securely?

Get Products.name: Get Products
Get Products.description: Retrieves a specified number of products with the option to skip a certain number of products, allowing sorting by attributes like price, name, category, etc. The response includes product details such as ID, name, and category for each product, along with a summary count of total products available.

example.User Query: Show me clothing products sorted by price in descending order.

Get Order.name: Get Order
Get Order.description: Retrieve order details based on the provided order ID. The 'id' parameter is the only required parameter for retrieving order details.

example.User Query: I need information about my recent purchase order with ID 24680, can you provide me with the order details?

253.tool_description: IPInfoAPI is a tool that can generate and retrieve IP addresses. This tool has 2 multiple built-in functions: 1. Generate IP.description: Generate fake IP addresses with different country-based formats for simulating global network traffic.

C# Versions is to retrieve a list of different versions of C# along with their release dates in a JSON format.

255.tool_description: Avatar.io - MODERN AVATAR PLACEHOLDER API is a tool that can generate clean and modern avatar placeholders for your application. This tool has 1 built-in function: 1. Generate avatar is to generate avatars with customizable name, background color, and text color.

Generate avatar.name: Generate avatar
Generate avatar.description: Generates avatars with customizable name, background color, and text color. Note: Potential errors during execution may affect responses.

optional_parameters.name: randomizer
optional_parameters.description:
The default browser behavior is to cache responses that return from the same endpoint.
If your images are all returning the same, pass this param with ANY value to ensure you bypass this default behaviour and get random images for every request.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Specify the name for the avatar. Only the first character of this parameter will be shown in the avatar.

optional_parameters.name: bg-color
optional_parameters.description:
Specify a HEX CODE color for the background of the avatar. 
Do not include the # of the hex code as it will be ignored on api request.

optional_parameters.name: text-color
optional_parameters.description:
Specify a HEX CODE color for the letter on the avatar. 
Do not include the # of the hex code as it will be ignored on api request.

example.User Query: Generate an avatar with the name 'Max' using a background color of '#336699' and text color of '#FFFF00'.

Password Generation.description: Generate random passwords with a specified length. Optional parameter 'length' available to customize password length. The default password length is 10 characters. Returns a specific error message if the user is unsubscribed.

257.tool_description: Email Validation is a tool that can validate the email address of your users at sign-up and get a risk score to help you eliminate fraud up-front, inform risk models, and build customized workflows. 258.tool_description: otp-2fa is a tool that can enhance security by integrating OTP functionality into applications, websites, or systems. Customize the barcode type and data to be encoded, with optional size adjustment.

download.name: download
download.description: Generate and download barcodes with support for various types such as qr_code, code_128, code_25, code_39, ean_13, and more. Customize the barcode type and data to be encoded, with optional size adjustment. Receive error messages for invalid data inputs.
